name: useRoleGuard
description: A React hook for role-based access control that checks user permissions against required roles. Provides utilities for authorization, redirection, and session management.

parameters.name: requiredRoles
parameters.description: Array of roles required to access the resource

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Configuration options for the role guard

user.description: User object with id and roles array

redirectTo.description: URL to redirect to when unauthorized (default: '/unauthorized')

onUnauthorized.description: Callback function to execute when user is unauthorized

sessionKey.description: Session storage key for user data (default: 'user')

returns.description: An object containing access control utilities and state

hasAccess.description: Whether the user has access to the current resource

hasAnyRole.description: Function to check if user has any of the specified roles

hasAllRoles.description: Function to check if user has all of the specified roles

isLoading.description: Whether the hook is currently loading user data

checkAccess.description: Function to check access for specific roles

example.title: Role-based component protection

notes: Automatically redirects unauthorized users if redirectTo is provided
Loads user data from session storage if no user is provided
Uses hasAnyRole logic for access checking by default
Handles loading state while retrieving user data from session
